headline: Assessing Prologis (PLD) Valuation After Dividend Hike And Data Center Co Investment Fund Plans
summary: Dividend increase and data center plans put Prologis in focus Prologis (PLD) has moved into the spotlight after raising its annualized dividend by 6% to $4.28 per share and outlining plans for a data center focused co investment fund and new development projects. See our latest analysis for Prologis. The recent dividend hike and data center plans come as momentum has been building, with a 30 day share price return of 11.29% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 21.15% suggesting investors...
